Adapted from: “Object-Oriented Programming Using C++” by Ira Pohl (Addison - Wesley)
Program that demonstrates overloaded functions selection in C++

children.label: Program that demonstrates overloaded functions selection in C++

children.value: The above program is compiled and run using Gnu Compiler Collection (g++):

jupyter_data.name: stdout
jupyter_data.text:
greater(10, 5) = 10
greater(7, 14.5) = 14.5
greater(10, 350 / 100) = 10 / 1	
greater(10 / 1, 350 / 100) = 10 / 1
Testing overloaded stream operation on rational class...
123 / 456
